description: We need to stop shipping ajaxterm. It's not our job to ship this stuff (just like we don't ship eventlet, libvirt, a kernel, kvm, Xen, etc.), and we suck at it anyway (the version we ship has multiple open CVE's).
title: Stop shipping ajaxterm

comments.content: We need to stop shipping ajaxterm. It's not our job to ship this stuff (just like we don't ship eventlet, libvirt, a kernel, kvm, Xen, etc.), and we suck at it anyway (the version we ship has multiple open CVE's).
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~soren
